Reviews.Title: Excellent point & shoot. Also a few tips.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this camera very much. It has excellent features at this price point, with easy menus and click wheels to get at them. I particularly liked that you can use the 10x zoom when you are videoing. Suprisingly other cameras I looked at could not.Here are a few tips. To open the bay that holds the battery and memory card, drag the door forward with your thumb (use the raised dots for a better grip) then you can lift it up. I had trouble transferring longer video clips with the USB cable; instead, put your SDHC memory card in a card reader (I used the Targus Universal 32 in 1 card reader/writer). I missed one tip that is in the manual the first time I read through it: once you press the shutter button down to start recording, you don't need to keep holding it down.

Reviews.Title: Fuji JZ500 Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary Martin
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality. The zoom is amazing and crystal clear. Battery life is great. Picture speed is top of the line, so you don't miss or blur the action.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera; nice price
Reviews.Author: L. Hooper
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera before going on Pilgrimage to Italy. I was able to get great pictures, including many in the churches without a flash.It is slim and can easily fit into a pocket or purse pocket. The zoom is great! I'm very happy with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Battery life and mode selection knob\selector
Reviews.Author: Franklin D "Franklin"
Reviews.Content: Nice cam and features but the mode dial which is use to select different shooting modes sits too low and makes it difficult to turn or rotateBattery life is really short. You can get about 100 films in without turning off the camera before it drains. Make sure you buy an extra battery

Reviews.Title: Very  good Fujifilm Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Barnett "barney11"
Reviews.Content: I used this camera for work and this camera take very good picture in light and low light. I Would Tell anyone that this camera is a good buy for the money. I can't wait to use this camera on vacation.

Reviews.Content: NICE SERVICE, NICE ITEM, ALL GOOD AND RECOMENDABLE!!THEY SHIPPED BEFORE THE DEADLINE AS I ASK CUZ I WAS IN A RUSH.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. The zoom on it is really good. I used this camera on the video mode to capture some water falls in the state of Connecticut it really was awesome.  We showed several people and they said it was as if they had been there with us taking the video.The sound was great.We took pictures of a hawk in a tree, a heron with a fish in its mouth, swans, water lilies, the children and friends and they all have been clear and true to the colors. Trying to take a still picture of something in motion does not come out well.

Reviews.Title: Too much glare for outdoor shots
Reviews.Author: 9keystoheaven9
Reviews.Content: Trying to take outdoor pictures in bright sunligth with this camera is difficult. The extreme amount of glare trying to take a photo simply by looking at the small screen is just impossible. You can't tell what you are looking at. I miss the small "one eyed view finder" that is missing in many of there new styled cameras. I would not purchase this product if I have know this.
